p: To evaluate the sensitivity of our results to input parameters and resolution of climate data, we conducted a sensitivity analyses by altering (1) the resolution of the climate data from 2 to 20â€‰km, (2) the bin width for defining a climate analogue and (3) the cost penalty associated with dissimilar climates ( equation 1) for a subset of N.
